title: I GOT MY FIRST PENTAKILL!!
body:
On ARAM....
..
..
With Master Yi....
..
..
Against a team that didn't build armour....
..
..
I don't feel very accomplished

replies.body: tHIS IS THE ONLY CHAMP NO ONE GIVES A DAMN ABOUT WHEN THEY GET PENTA'S...

when u get 1 as supp raka
u know u r god

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KuOaFVtj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-12T03:53:59.843+0000)
>
> ....not even ranked.

Why do people act like ranked pentas don't count? I have had pentas in both normals and ranked and they weren't really different in anyway.

its only ranked pentas that count.

its about the confirmation.

its like being in a war, confirmed kills are all that really count. cos you could just say "i killed over 1000 nazis" but really only 10 confirmed kills.
like how i have over 900 AI pentas in the past 3 months alone. (and farmed 32 pentas in 1 game as heimerdinger.) they dont mean %%%%.
or the 7 pentas in a single game as karthus on that snowdown thingy.
or the 4 pentas in a normal game as karthus. or the 3 as kat in 1 game.
all normals or unimportant game modes.
whereas my confirmed twitch penta in ranked counts. better yet it was a 2 vs 5. and i have it recorded.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KuOaFVtj,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-12T04:23:42.408+0000)
>
> its only ranked pentas that count.
> 
> its about the confirmation.
> 
> its like being in a war, confirmed kills are all that really count. cos you could just say "i killed over 1000 nazis" but really only 10 confirmed kills.
> like how i have over 900 AI pentas in the past 3 months alone. (and farmed 32 pentas in 1 game as heimerdinger.) they dont mean %%%%.
> or the 7 pentas in a single game as karthus on that snowdown thingy.
> or the 4 pentas in a normal game as karthus. or the 3 as kat in 1 game.
> all normals or unimportant game modes.
> whereas my confirmed twitch penta in ranked counts. better yet it was a 2 vs 5. and i have it recorded.

I can prove that I got the pentakill

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/78688888/201370265?tab=overview

> [{quoted}](name=Niji,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KuOaFVtj,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-12T04:14:02.025+0000)
>
> Why do people act like ranked pentas don't count? I have had pentas in both normals and ranked and they weren't really different in anyway.

there are other factors in a 'special penta'


-the elo
-if its aram/the game mode 
-if the enemy is intent feeding
-if they GIVE it to you
-how fed as %%%% were you
-how behind they were

and finally
What actually happens in the penta is whats special.

Never had a penta in a normal/rank match lel


Maybe because i don't play mobile assasins

I got a penta kill once and I didn't even know I got it until everyone started congratulating because I was simply killing everything I ran into. Getting a penta wasn't even in my mind. It was just. Kill.
